long_description: Kids can ride flat free, too! The 20 x 2.125 STOP Flats2 Tire Liners are durable, lightweight polyurethane and provide a protective layer between road hazards and the inner tubes. Hardened outer layer provides added protection from road debris, thorns, rim cuts, glass and nails; soft inner layer cushions inner tube. Installs easily with no gooey mess; liners can be removed and used on another bike. Won't cause tire or tube damage or loosen spokes. Package of 2.
short_description: Kids can ride flat free, too! The 20 x 2.125 STOP Flats2 Tire Liners are durable, lightweight polyurethane and provide a protective layer between road hazards and the inner tubes.
